original_text: “Speak to the people of Israel, saying, On the fifteenth day of this seventh month and for seven days is the Feast of Booths to the Lord.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에게 말하여 이르라 일곱째 달 열닷샛날은 초막절이니 여호와를 위하여 이레 동안 지킬 것이라

sentences.original_text: “Speak to the people of Israel, saying,
On the fifteenth day of this seventh month
is the Feast of Booths to the Lord.”
